name: BioVision Analytics
notes: Specializes in AI-powered analytics solutions for biotech research labs and pharmaceutical companies. Focuses on drug discovery optimization and clinical trial data analysis.

name: MediaStream Solutions
notes: Develops immersive media platforms and streaming solutions for broadcast companies and content creators. Specializes in AR/VR content delivery systems.

name: EduTech Dynamics
notes: Creates custom learning management systems and educational technology solutions for K-12 schools and universities. Focuses on interactive learning platforms and administrative tools.
